mapper.select: select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main where stateid = '1'and status = '1' and MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND to_char(createdtime,'yyyy') = '2021' AND MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId} AND createdtime >= #{startDate}+0 AND createdtime < #{endDate}+0

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main where stateid = '1'and status = '1' and MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId} AND createdtime >= #{startDate}+0 AND createdtime < #{endDate}+0

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main where stateid = '1'and status = '1' and verify='1' and MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId} AND createdtime >= #{startDate}+0 AND createdtime < #{endDate}+0

select archivesid from phis_webhis.v_opr_register where archivesid is not null
and seedate >= #{startDate}+0
and seedate < #{endDate}+0
and orgcode=#{unitId} group by archivesid

select t.code from ((select code from phis_chss.v_fhc_check_main where 1=1
and examdate>= #{startDate}+0
and examdate < #{endDate}+0
group by code) union (select code from phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit where 1=1
and visitdate>= #{startDate}+0
and visitdate < #{endDate}+0
group by code )) t join phis_chss.v_fha_person_main p on t.code=p.code where p.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and MANAGEDSTATIONCODE=#{unitId} and p.stateid=1 and p.status=1

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main where code in ( select p.code from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main p join phis_chss.v_fhc_check_main c on p.code = c.code and p.stateid = '1' and c.stateid = '1' where p.birthday <= add_months(sysdate, -12 * 65) group by p.code) and MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId} AND createdtime >= #{startDate} + 0 AND createdtime < #{endDate} + 0

select count(managedcentercode) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main where birthday <= add_months(sysdate,-12*65) and stateid = '1' and status = '1' and MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId} AND createdtime >= #{startDate}+0 AND createdtime < #{endDate}+0

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main where birthday<= add_months(sysdate,-12*65) and code in( select pm.code from phis_chss.v_fhc_check_main pm join phis_chss.v_fhc_check_attach1 pa on pm.CHID=pa.LINKID join phis_chss.v_fhr_elder_self_care pc on pm.CODE=pc.CODE where (pm.exercisecode is not null or pm.EATCUSTOMCODE is not null or pm.SMOKECODE is not null or pm.drinkcode is not null or pm.WORKDISEASECODE is not null) and (pm.heat is not null or pm.PULSE is not null or pm.BREATH is not null or pm.RSBP is not null or pm.RDBP is not null or pm.HEIGHT is not null or pm.WEIGHT is not null or pm.WAIST is not null or pm.BMI is not null or pa.FEVERCODE is not null or pa.DENTITION is not null or pa.PHARYNGEALCODE is not null or pa.EYELEFT is not null or pa.EYERIGHT is not null or pa.AUDITIONCODE is not null or pa.SPORTFUNCTIONCODE is not null or pa.EYEGROUNDCODE is not null or pa.SKINCODE is not null or pa.SCLERACODE is not null or pa.SCROFULACODE is not null or pa.BUCKETCODE is not null or pa.BREATHSOUNDCODE is not null or pa.RALECODE is not null or pa.HEARTRATE is not null or pa.RHYTHMCODE is not null or pa.SOUFFLECODE is not null or pa.TENDERNESSCODE is not null or pa.ENCLOSECODE is not null or pa.HEPATOMECODE is not null or pa.SPLENAUXECODE is not null or pa.SONANTCODE is not null or pa.LOWEXTRECODE is not null or pa.ACROTARSIUMCODE is not null or pa.ANUSCODE is not null or pa.GALACTOPHORECODE is not null or pa.PUDENDUMCODE is not null or pa.VAGINACODE is not null or pa.UTERUSNECKCODE is not null or pa.UTERUSBODYCODE is not null or pa.ADNEXACODE is not null) and (pa.HEMOGLOBIN is not null or pa.WBC is not null or pa.PLATELET is not null or pa.UPROTEIN is not null or pa.GIU is not null or pa.UAB is not null or pa.HEMATURIA is not null or pa.FBGDL1 is not null or pa.FBGDL2 is not null or pa.CARDIOGRAMCODE is not null or pa.UAA is not null or pa.FOBCODE is not null or pa.GH is not null or pa.HBSAGCODE is not null or pa.SGPT is not null or pa.SGOT is not null or pa.ALBUMIN is not null or pa.BILIRUBIN is not null or pa.CB is not null or pa.DSC is not null or pa.BUN is not null or pa.BK is not null or pa.BN is not null or pa.TC is not null or pa.TG is not null or pa.HDLC is not null or pa.LCLC is not null) and (pa.INSTRUCTCODE is not null) group by pm.CODE ) and stateid = '1' and status = '1' and MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND createdtime >= #{startDate}+0 AND createdtime < #{endDate}+0 AND MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main where linkb is not null and code in ( select code from phis_chss.v_fhc_check_main where examdate >= #{startDate}+0 AND examdate < #{endDate}+0 group by code ) AND MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm join phis_chss.v_fhb_blood_main pb on pm.code = pb.code and pb.STATEID = '1' where pm.stateid = '1' AND pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND pb.CREATEDTIME >= #{startDate} + 0 AND pb.CREATEDTIME < #{endDate} + 0 AND pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm join phis_chss.V_FHB_BLOOD_VISIT pb on pm.code = pb.code and pb.STATEID = '1' where pm.stateid = '1' AND pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND pb.visitdate >= #{startDate} + 0 AND pb.visitdate < #{endDate} + 0 AND pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm join phis_chss.V_FHB_BLOOD_VISIT pb on pm.code = pb.code and pb.STATEID = '1' where pm.stateid = '1' AND pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND pb.VISITDATENEXT >= #{startDate} + 0 AND pb.VISITDATENEXT < #{endDate} + 0 AND pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main p join phis_chss.v_fhc_check_main c on c.code = p.code and c.stateid = '1' where p.code in ( select b.code from phis_chss.v_fhb_blood_main b join phis_chss.v_fhc_check_main c on c.code = b.code and c.stateid = '1' group by b.code) and p.stateid = '1' and p.status = '1' AND p.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND c.OPERTIME >= #{startDate} + 0 AND c.OPERTIME < #{endDate} + 0 AND p.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main where linkd is not null and code in ( select c.code from phis_chss.v_fhc_check_main c JOIN phis_chss.v_fhc_check_attach1 ca on c.chid=ca.linkid where ca.createdtime >= #{startDate} AND ca.createdtime < #{endDate} group by c.code ) AND MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm join phis_chss.v_fhd_diabetes_main pb on pm.code = pb.code and pb.STATEID = '1' where pm.stateid = '1' AND pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND pb.CREATEDTIME >= #{startDate} + 0 AND pb.CREATEDTIME < #{endDate} + 0 AND pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm join phis_chss.v_fhd_diabetes_visit pb on pm.code = pb.code and pb.STATEID = '1' where pm.stateid = '1' AND pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND pb.visitdate >= #{startDate} + 0 AND pb.visitdate < #{endDate} + 0 AND pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm join phis_chss.v_fhd_diabetes_visit pb on pm.code = pb.code and pb.STATEID = '1' where pm.stateid = '1' AND pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND pb.VISITDATENEXT >= #{startDate} + 0 AND pb.VISITDATENEXT < #{endDate} + 0 AND pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main p join phis_chss.v_fhc_check_main c on c.code = p.code and c.stateid = '1' where p.code in ( select b.code from phis_chss.v_fhd_diabetes_main b join phis_chss.v_fhc_check_main c on c.code = b.code and c.stateid = '1' group by b.code) and p.stateid = '1' and p.status = '1' AND p.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND c.OPERTIME >= #{startDate} + 0 AND c.OPERTIME < #{endDate} + 0 AND p.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from ( select pm.code from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm join phis_chss.v_fhr_elder_tcm_item pt on pm.CODE=pt.CODE AND pt.stateid = '1' join phis_chss.v_fhr_elder_tcm_physique pp on pt.CHID=pp.LINKID AND pp.stateid = '1' where pm.birthday <= add_months(sysdate,-12*65) AND pm.stateid = '1' and pm.status = '1' AND pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND pm.createdtime >= #{startDate}+0 AND pm.createdtime < #{endDate}+0 AND pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId} group by pm.code )

select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main where ( birthday <= add_months(sysdate,-12*65) or code in (select code from phis_chss.v_fhb_blood_main) or code in (select code from phis_chss.v_fhd_diabetes_main) or code in (select code from phis_chss.v_fhn_brain_main) or code in (select code from phis_chss.v_fhx_heart_main) ) AND createdtime >= #{startDate}+0 AND createdtime < #{endDate}+0 AND managedcentercode = #{unitId}
